item.title: Meta previews new parental controls for its AI experiences

item.title: Reddit expands its AI-powered search to five new languages
item.description: Reddit announced Thursday that it is expanding its AI-powered search experience to five new languages: French, German, Spanish, Italian, and Portugues...

item.title: OpenAI pauses Sora video generations of Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: OpenAI is pausing AI video generations of Martin Luther King at the request of the late civil rights activists' estate.

item.title: Defunct electric aircraft startup Lilium’s tech lives on over at Archer
item.description: Archer prevailed in a competitive bidding process that included Ambitious Air Mobility Group and U.S. based Joby Aviation.

item.title: VC legend Ron Conway quits Salesforce Foundation after Benioff’s National Guard comments
item.description: Ron Conway has been on the board of the Salesforce's philanthropic organization for 10 years.
